Midwest C. elegans Meeting 2018

Welcome!

The 6th Annual Midwest C. elegans Meeting will be held on Saturday, April 7, 2018 at Eastern Michigan University. The meeting is open to anyone interested in using C. elegans or other nematodes in research or teaching. The registration fee is $[??]. Lunch is included in the registration fee.

Please register and submit an abstract by March 24th. Late abstracts will be accommodated if possible, but late abstracts might not be included in the program book.

Sponsors

We are actively looking for additional sponsors for 2018.

Meeting Organizers

Hannah Seidel, Eastern Michigan University

Erika Sorensen, Wabash College
